name: Wamu Wamu 2
description:
Wamu Wamu 2 is a short experimental game about pieces of fruit that are infested by big worms, could you please clean them so they can be eaten?



Features
  • Around 4-8 minutes of playtime.
  • Cute & colourful aesthetic with warm tones and soft gradients.
  • Use 3 different tools to clean 3 pieces of fruit.
  • It's very short, and weird, but funny?

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Z to jump.
  • X to use tool.
  • C to switch tool.



Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
